title: Asheville Pizza and Brewing
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Reported to offer Daiya cheese starting end of October 2013. Besides that, has a number of vegan choices and also items that can be made vegan. As of November 2013, there are two other locations in Asheville. Family-friendly restaurant with a movie theater, showing family movies, and large video game room. Unique menu item names and a fun atmosphere.
